mapper.select: SELECT ap.id, ap.start_time, ap.end_time, ap.create_time, ap.dept_id, ap.applicant_id, ap.principal_id, ap.company_id, ap.apply_info, ap.create_time, su1.user_name AS applicantName, su2.user_name AS principalName, ap.apply_status, ci.company_name AS companyName, sd.dept_name AS deptName FROM apply_info ap LEFT JOIN sys_dept sd ON ap.dept_id = sd.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su1 ON ap.applicant_id = su1.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su2 ON ap.principal_id = su2.user_id LEFT JOIN company_info ci ON ap.company_id = ci.id WHERE ap.id = #{id} ORDER BY ap.create_time DESC
